metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3606 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle Java SE 7u101 and 8u92 and Java SE Embedded 8u91 allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via vectors related to Hotspot. A vulnerability was discovered in the OpenJDK JRE related to information disclosure, data integrity, and availability. An attacker could exploit this to cause a denial of service, expose sensitive data over the network, or possibly execute arbitrary code.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-3606` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

icedtea-6-jre-cacao - 6b40-1.13.12-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
icedtea-6-jre-jamvm - 6b40-1.13.12-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
openjdk-6-demo - 6b40-1.13.12-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
openjdk-6-jdk - 6b40-1.13.12-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
openjdk-6-jre - 6b40-1.13.12-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
openjdk-6-jre-headless - 6b40-1.13.12-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
openjdk-6-jre-lib - 6b40-1.13.12-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
openjdk-6-jre-zero - 6b40-1.13.12-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
openjdk-6-source - 6b40-1.13.12-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
No subscription required

icedtea-7-jre-jamvm - 7u111-2.6.7-0ubuntu0.14.04.3
openjdk-7-demo - 7u111-2.6.7-0ubuntu0.14.04.3
openjdk-7-jdk - 7u111-2.6.7-0ubuntu0.14.04.3
openjdk-7-jre - 7u111-2.6.7-0ubuntu0.14.04.3
openjdk-7-jre-headless - 7u111-2.6.7-0ubuntu0.14.04.3
openjdk-7-jre-lib - 7u111-2.6.7-0ubuntu0.14.04.3
openjdk-7-jre-zero - 7u111-2.6.7-0ubuntu0.14.04.3
openjdk-7-source - 7u111-2.6.7-0ubuntu0.14.04.3
No subscription required

notes.Note: sbeattie> likely does not affect openjdk-6

criterions.comment: openjdk-6 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6b40-1.13.12-0ubuntu0.14.04.2').
openjdk-7 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7u111-2.6.7-0ubuntu0.14.04.3').
